trans-unit.source: Represents an entry in a <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.FileDialog"></xref> custom place list.
trans-unit.target: 表示中的条目<xref href="Microsoft.Win32.FileDialog"></xref>自定义空间列表。

trans-unit.source: Starting in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winvista](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-winvista-md.md)], open and save file dialog boxes have a **Favorite Links** panel on the left side of the dialog box that allows the user to quickly navigate to a different location.
trans-unit.target: 从开始[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winvista](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-winvista-md.md)]、 打开和保存文件对话框具有**收藏夹链接**允许用户能够快速导航到其他位置的对话框中左侧的面板。

trans-unit.source: These links are called custom places.
trans-unit.target: 这些链接称为自定义区域。

trans-unit.source: This class allows you to modify the list that appears when your application uses a file dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 此类允许你修改你的应用程序使用一个文件对话框时将显示的列表。

trans-unit.source: For the list of known folders for custom places, see <xref:Microsoft.Win32.FileDialogCustomPlaces>.
trans-unit.target: 有关自定义位置的已知文件夹的列表，请参阅<xref:Microsoft.Win32.FileDialogCustomPlaces>.</xref:Microsoft.Win32.FileDialogCustomPlaces>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.FileDialogCustomPlace"></xref> class with the specified known folder GUID.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="Microsoft.Win32.FileDialogCustomPlace"></xref>与指定的已知文件夹 GUID 的类。

trans-unit.source: The GUID of a known folder.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.FileDialogCustomPlace"></xref> class with the specified path.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="Microsoft.Win32.FileDialogCustomPlace"></xref>与指定路径的类。

trans-unit.source: Gets the GUID of the known folder for the custom place.
trans-unit.target: 获取自定义位置的已知文件夹 GUID。

trans-unit.source: GUIDs are associated with the known folders.
trans-unit.target: Guid 不与已知文件夹相关联。

trans-unit.source: For the list of known folders, see <xref:Microsoft.Win32.FileDialogCustomPlaces>.
trans-unit.target: 有关的已知文件夹的列表，请参阅<xref:Microsoft.Win32.FileDialogCustomPlaces>。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.FileDialogCustomPlaces>

trans-unit.source: The GUID of a known folder.
Gets the file path for the custom place.
trans-unit.target: 获取自定义位置的文件路径。

trans-unit.source: The path for a custom place.
